body:
Hi Tim,


polycarbonate spectral transmittance or BSDF (distribution of scattered light) 
data or model of polycarbonate double-walled extruded sheets, like "Lexan 
Thermoclear" ?


For the latter, how accurate you want to model the typical glare "ring" ? Just 
its position (relatively simple cal file) or a complete model for a specific 
material ?


best
Peter
